snippet.title: GRIME: Colors of Rot | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
ESRB Rated: TEEN for Animated Blood, Fantasy Violence
Play Today on PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1123050/GRIME/​

GRIME: Colors of Rot releases for PC, Xbox and Playstation on December 15th!

Crush your foes with living weapons and consume their essence with your sentient black hole! GRIME is a fast and unforgiving soulslike metroidvania coming to consoles. Brandish the living weapons to dominate your enemies today!

To learn more about GRIME, Clover Bite, or Akupara Games, visit:
►GRIME: https://linktr.ee/playgrime
►Clover Bite: https://www.grimegame.com/​
►Akupara Games: http://linktr.ee/akuparagames
